Sentencas: In the present study, a novel combined system consisting of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC), organic Rankine cycle (ORC), and compressed air energy storage (CAES) is proposed, investigated, and optimized.
Titulo: Soft computing analysis of a compressed air energy storage and SOFC system via different artificial neural network architecture and tri-objective grey wolf optimization

Sentencas: The SOFC and CAES models are validated individually to ensure the accuracy of the results.
Titulo: Soft computing analysis of a compressed air energy storage and SOFC system via different artificial neural network architecture and tri-objective grey wolf optimization

Sentencas: Here, the grey wolf multi-objective optimization (MOGWO) approach is applied to find the optimal system design and performance.
Titulo: Soft computing analysis of a compressed air energy storage and SOFC system via different artificial neural network architecture and tri-objective grey wolf optimization

Sentencas: For this, a trained neural network is provided to the MOGWO algorithm as a fitted function, and multi-objective optimization is carried out on it.
Titulo: Soft computing analysis of a compressed air energy storage and SOFC system via different artificial neural network architecture and tri-objective grey wolf optimization

Sentencas: The most significant benefit of the suggested method is time-saving.
Titulo: Soft computing analysis of a compressed air energy storage and SOFC system via different artificial neural network architecture and tri-objective grey wolf optimization

Sentencas: The proposed system's thermodynamic performance is investigated from the energy, exergy, economic, and environmental (4E) points of view at three periods, including full-time, charging, and discharging periods.
Titulo: Soft computing analysis of a compressed air energy storage and SOFC system via different artificial neural network architecture and tri-objective grey wolf optimization

Sentencas: The results indicate that the Levenberg-Marquardt training algorithm has the best performance among all of the algorithms.
Titulo: Soft computing analysis of a compressed air energy storage and SOFC system via different artificial neural network architecture and tri-objective grey wolf optimization

Sentencas: The value of exergetic round trip efficiency (ERTE), total cost rate, and CO2 emission at the best optimum point are obtained as 45.7%, 34.2 $/h, and 0.22 kg/kWh, respectively.
Titulo: Soft computing analysis of a compressed air energy storage and SOFC system via different artificial neural network architecture and tri-objective grey wolf optimization
